> The obvious fix is to simply relax the deepEqualValue's "hard" predicate to include Ptr-Kinded Values. 

Yes, this does work, just checked.

> How did you discover this problem? Do you have a real-world application that's negatively affected by it?

It was a failing [test](https://github.com/Popog/deepcopy/blob/60812dea73f18f8bb75f4b23c0e14a19e2013d74/deepcopy_test.go#L20) for [deepcopy](https://github.com/Popog/deepcopy) module found on github. Not a real-world application though, but I assume this test worked before so it's probably a regression.
